page.title: 08POST HOUSE HOTEL
page.content:
The Post House is one of the newer hotels in Coventry; it was built in 1972. It is two miles from the city centre and next to the A45. Also nearby are the National Exhibition Centre, Birmingham International Airport, and the Royal Showground.
The hotel employs 82 staff. There are 200 bedrooms. A typical bedroom has its own bathroom and toilet, a radio, a television, a telephone, and a welcome tray so that you are able to have a drink of tea or coffee whenever you want. Other services are a laundry, shoe cleaning, room service for snacks, special menu facilities, and baby sitting.
